synopsis: The travelers arrive in a ravaged Tokyo and immediately find themselves in danger. Kamui grants them sanctuary after Syaoran is seriously injured. Yet, far away, another Syaoran stirs!
All is not as it seems, as the travelers come face to face with Syaoran's dangerous duplicate! The encounter ends as quickly as it begins - but not before Fai feels the wrath of the clone's rage.
Fai is near death, forcing Kurogane to take swift action. Later, after Yuko reveals the identity of the one responsible for scattering Sakura's memories, the travelers set out for a new world.
